body.p:
CIVIC LONDON 1550-1
Court of Aldermen, Repertory I2(2) MT: CoL/CA[0i[01/013
f 204v (23 December)
...
At this Courte certein comen plaiers of interludes within this Citie were
bounden by Recogniaanee as herafter insuythe/
Item lohannes Nethe] Robertus Southyn] Robertus Brake Robertus Peacocke/
lohannes Nethersall] Robertus Sutton] Ricaraus lugler] lohannes Ronner/
Willelmus Readyng] Edwardus Stokedale] lohannes Rawlyns lohannes
Crane] Ricaraus Cyrke lohannes Radstone 0liuerus Page Ricaraus Pokeley
Ricaraus Paiseley & Willelmus Clement recognoverun: se & eorum quemlibet
per se debere Boino Regi xx li. bonis &c. soluenaas &c./
The condicion &c. that yf the above bounden lohn Nethe Robert Southyn
&c. [&] ,/ne eny of them do not at herafter play eny interlude or comen
play within eny of our Soueraygn Lorde the kynges domynyons without
the espeeiall licence of our seid Soueraygn Lorde or of his most honourable
Councell for the tyme beyng had & obteyned for the same] And also yf
they the seid Recognytours & euery of them do att all & euery tyme &
tymes herafter] when they & or any of them] shalbe by the seid Counsell
or eny of them sent for] personally appere before the seid Counsell or some
of them that then &c. orels &c./
...
f 228.T3April)
ltem the draught of the proclamacion for the obeying of Arrestes & puttyng
awaye of interludes for a season] And also the counterbonde to be sealyd by
the kynges Maiestie for the Cities discharge for suche Bondes as they have
lately entred into for his grace were delyueryd ouer to my Lorde Maier to
be sent ouer accordyngly
. . .
f 346 (18 [une)
...
Item it was agreyd that preceptes to euerye of my maisters thaldremen for
the ordering of their watches vpon Mydsomer evin & saint peters evin in
euerye point as thei were ordered the last yere shalbe made & delyuered
fourth out of hand/.
. ..
14] eny: corrected over euery
